content: Fully verified and legally opened USA business bank account. All accounts we sell are legally open and not hacked, cracked or otherwise stolen accounts. Great account for re-sellers. 80 active cards at a time means you can create and verify 80 accounts per batch. Delete the cards then create and verify 80 more accounts. Verify hundreds of accounts per day with no fees.Account features:*120 Active VCC*Unlimited total VCC*No monthly or yearly account fees*No card issuing fees*Instantly issue VCC cards in any name or AVS zip code no KYC required*Set card limits to each card individually*Real physical regional bank debit card BIN*16 VBA with different account numbers*Fund the account via SWIFT, Wire, ACH, Credit, Debit or Crypto*Instant DeliveryPay via: credit card/debit card/BTC/LTC/USDT/ETH/USDCLogin before paying. Don`t be fooled by copycats buy direct from the source.https://t.me/Vcardsint
